item.description:
Announcing our third Creative Show & Tell for 2009

I might be changing this to a venue in Central Square, not sure yet.

Join us for a delicious show & tell, bring your work, or photos of your work to share with the group and get useful feedback on from other creative peoples! Perhaps you have an idea for something new or want to revive and old creative hobby.

What people are saying about this monthly event..

  • “ Really had a fun time, great to put faces with names and see what fun things folks were doing. ”
  • “ Great group of people. I especially enjoyed viewing everyone's work. ”
  • “ It was really interesting to see work of other members and their different perspective about creative ideas. The only thing I didn't like was that only 7 members showed up when till the last moment there were 17 Yes to this Meetup. ”
  • “ Nice location, good size group for me since I was new. It was smaller (7 total) but easier to get to know people. Nice work shown, too. Paul was great at collecting info to send out. ”
  • “ A wonderful group of people - this was my first time at a meetup - and great to compare notes on various artistic endeavors. The event was well-organized. ”
  • “ Wonderful time, everyone was really connecting and showing their work. These just keep getting better and better - can't wait for the next one! ”
  • “ This is a great event and loved hearing about what everyone else is doing. Definitely spurred some creative energy! Really enjoyed meeting and connecting with everyone. ”
  • “ Was fun! Nice to meet you all and see your work. ”

Based on your poll choices we are having our creative event at a different day & time from those in the past. If I get a good turnout, I'll do more like this one.

This event will run with a minimum of 4 people.

Hope to see you there!

Paul

PS here's Finale's site for directions & parking: http://www.finaledess...
item.how_to_find_us: Come in and ask the staff
item.name: March Creative Meet, Greet, Show and Tell
